projects.title: NekoScraper
projects.description: Blazingly fast Java-based scraper for a very specific university’s grade portal, turbocharged with Java and Selenium’s ExpectedConditions for speed and stability!

projects.title: Fitrackz
projects.description: Solo-built full-stack fitness tracking app with sensor data collection. Designed responsive UI with TailwindCSS and integrated user auth + dashboard analytics.

projects.title: Simple Calculator
projects.description: A simple command-line calculator written purely in x86 Assembly that supports the four basic arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A minimalistic portfolio website showcasing projects and skills with smooth animations and responsive design.

projects.title: PHP_SVU_B4
projects.description: Wrote documentation for the PHP_SVU_B4 project, to help out my fellow classmates and improve the overall understanding of the codebase.

projects.title: PoolMyRide
projects.description: PoolMyRide is a web-driven car pooling application, that aims to provide you with a side income, while you go about your day-to-day chores.
